posts.post_text: February 23, 2016 at 4:28 PM#2Assign Timecode x /slot=-1 (or "intern") is Internal0 (or "link selected") is Selected1..8 is the specific slot

posts.author: justinpma
posts.post_text: February 25, 2016 at 2:56 PM#4Thank you,I've wrote this macro which I would like to share,hopefully will work for others without problemSetUserVar $select=("1.Internal 2.Link Selected 3.TC Slot")[$select=="1"]  Assign Timecode (Which Timecode Pool?)/slot= -1[$select=="2"]  Assign Timecode (Which Timecode Pool?)/slot= 0[$select=="3"]  Assign Timecode (Which Timecode Pool?)/slot=(Which Slot?)It's a very simple one where you can pick which slot to go for and which time code pool you want to apply it.
